title: Search in formatted text in any fields

full search.description: Whether to allow search in every fields. Set it to `false` to save space. Set it to `true` to use this add-on.

default.description: set to false to use this add-on, and true to use anki's normal setting.

sort field.description: If you want to sort using `Sort field`, set it to True. Otherwise, set it to `false` to save space. The default configuration of anki corresponds to `true`.
